content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I'm looking to get the highest price possible for it. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my goal is to secure the lowest possible price. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
